page.title: 13Men's Recreation
page.content: Of 40 men questioned about their leisuretime activities:- 30 take part in outdoor sports. These included, 3 fishing; 3 cricket; 3 motor racing; 2 swimming; 2 squash; 2 shooting; 2 football. For 12, gardening was their hobby, 9 said that 'do it yourself' was one of their hobbies. Reading was a hobby for 6 of the men. Another 6 took part in indoor sports such as squash, swimming and badmington. For most of the recreational activities the men had to travel to places such as Stratford and Warwick. Some men travelled to places as far away as Wales, the Lake District and London.
